attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To petition the Home Secretary to set up an enquiry into  the way the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds have perverted the course of justice to secure convictions and the way the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds have used there money and power to unfairly manipulate the way the law is constructed and have the members of the Royal Society for the Protection of Birds in the House Parliament, the House of Lords and Animal Health had an unfair influence on the laws protecting birds?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
